original_text: Jeremiah set out from Jerusalem to go to the land of Benjamin to receive his portion there among the people.
korean_text: 예레미야가 베냐민 땅에서 백성 가운데 분깃을 받으려고 예루살렘을 떠나 그리로 가려 하여

sentences.original_text: to go to the land of Benjamin
to receive his portion there among the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳 백성들 가운데서 그의 몫을 받기 위해
